reviewText: I own a lot of guitar instructional DVDs, and Rolly are the best I've seen! I own all of them now!

I had my first guitar fingerpicking lesson from Rolly more years ago than I care to admit. I bought this to fill in some of the blanks in my technique developed over time because of wanting to find my own way. That works to a point. ;-)

Rolly is an excellent teacher as well as a fantastic guitar player - really knows the instrument and communicates it clearly.
